long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome Extension allows users to assign Howdou Interactive Tutorials directly in Google Classroom and imports the scores after completion. This extension can be used by teachers, coaches and administrators to enhance the digital skills of their staff and students (students do not require this extension). 

There are a number of free Howdous available and you can subscribe to gain access to our full set. For more details see workspaceskills.com
